API

User facing method

matplatex.save(figure: Figure, filename: str, *, widthcommand: str = '\\figurewidth', draw_anchors: bool = False, verbose: int = 1)

Save matplotlib Figure with text in a separate tex file.

Parameters:

  • figure (matplotlib.figure.Figure) – The matplotlib Figure to save

  • filename (str) – The name to use for the files, without extention

  • widthcommand (str) – The LaTeX length command which will be used to define the width of the figure.

  • draw_anchors (bool) – If True, mark the text anchors on the figure. Useful for debugging.

  • verbose (int) –

    Set level of printed messages.

    • 0: Print nothing.

    • 1: Print save message to stdout. (default)

    • 2: Also print runtime info to stderr.

Return type:

None

Implementation

Coming at some point.
